resources.string:
• Improved navigational layout of work order statuses
  • Optionally add an ETA when requesting a work order
  • Can now modify the ETA on a work order
  • Added progress bar for photo upload tasks
  • Improved bundled work order requesting and accepting
  • Additional contacts are now being displayed in a work order
  • Can now modify time upon check in/out

• Fixed crashes caused by rotating the phone while uploading photos
  • Fixed app getting stuck in retry loop while downloading files
  • Bullet points now show up in work order descriptions

• New look and feel
  • More work order search options
